notificationOptions.title: New mail from Brant Hodestrine: Easy Hike in S.F. next Saturday!
notificationOptions.message: Hey, The trail starts from 'Merrie Way' Outer Richmond side. We can do brunch before in the Inner Richmond, maybe at that Russian place we used to go to after fencing.

notificationOptions.title: Google Calendar reminder
notificationOptions.message: Team Meeting (Brant Hodestrine) is starting at 10:25pm in SFO-CEN-3-Triptych (12), NYC-WES-2-Wegman (8), PAR-OPR-4-CÃ©zanne http://www.example.com/talk/meet/example
